pages.text: Turrisaspis is a placoderm with a head shield that had a single sharp spine at the top of its head, with ridges along the spine. It is known from fragments from the Upper Devonian of Pennsylvania.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
